Title: Halter Evening Dress with Cut Out

----

Sku: S5236

Featured-image: S5236-royal-halter-evening-dress-with-cut-out_p.jpg

----

Description: This mock two piece is exquisite and sexy. The halter top creates a stunning backless silhouette trimmed with jewels. The bodice has cut outs on the neckline and shows portions of the midriff. The waistline is trimmed with the beading pattern and the high split in the front of the chiffon skirt finishes the look.
